pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two Functions for Generalized SARIMA Time Series Simulation // Write SARIMA models in (finite) AR representation and simulate generalized multiplicative seasonal autoregressive moving average (time) series with Normal / Gaussian, Poisson or negative binomial distribution. The methodology of this method is described in Briet OJT, Amerasinghe PH, and Vounatsou P (2013) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0065761.
